item.description:
UPDATE 3/26/12: This game is currently full. If you have emailed me and are not on the list of players you have been placed on the waitlist and will be emailed if there is a player cancellation. If you would like to be added to the waitlist, follow the instructions below.

Intermediate level : Players with a good understanding of volleyball and a good grasp of volleyball skills: passing, setting, hitting. This is not a recreational level game, however we do not run advanced formations - players will rotate and play all positions.

INSTRUCTIONS: If you'd like to play, please do the following:

1. Send an email to Valerie using the following URL: http://www.meetup.com/volleyball-122/message/?recipientId=12551965

There is a strict cap to make sure everyone gets lots of playing time. Note that sending an email does not guarantee a spot to play; spots are only guaranteed if you receive a positive confirmation email.

The cost of the meetup will be $5. Please pay the organizer when you arrive before the meetup starts. The money goes to cover the cost of the court rental. The entrance to the gym is on Cambridge Street opposite Harvard Market. The nearest intersection to the entrance is Cambridge Street and Roberts Road. The nearest T stop is Harvard Square. The gym is about a ten minute walk from the T stop. Parking near the school on Sundays is generally easy to find, as meters and residential parking rules are generally not enforced on Sundays (parking signs should say "EX SUNDAY" or similar).
item.name: Cambridge Intermediate Indoor Volleyball
